name: Week 2 - Dual Brain Race V 0.2
description:
Welcome to Dual Brain Race!

This game is designed to test your reflexes and reaction time in this adventure where you drive two cars at the same time.

Your Goal is to avoid the other cars and get to the end line. If one or both or your cars impacts the competition. You Lose!

Enjoy this fun and challenging adventure!

Version 0.2: Addition of Particle effects next to the tracks
